TopicTitle: KSP Crashes on Main Menu Load [Hefty Install] [Windows 10 x64]

Articles.Content:
I've created a hefty career install of KSP so I can grind Interstellar Quest style but I've run into the issue where KSP constantly crashes on the load to the Main Menu. I would just like to know why. Have I run out of RAM? Mod conflict? Once I know I can begin to resolve any possible issue; it's just without knowing how to read a output log, I am uncertain what steps to begin; I've tried uninstalling select mods, but the issue just seems to continue randomly and I've been unable to identify which mod may be causing an issue (if it is one mod). I've also tried -force-opengl and -force-d3d11 shortcuts to no avail.

Information:

Windows 10

KSP 1.3.0; x64

Mods Installed via CKAN

Output log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lzPJoite375hPddU_lKvGuS9-F1oO0CY/view?usp=sharing

Error log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/19cckBmx5q0ClI1IeLNQ661uvUF7SkhFC/view?usp=sharing
